mapper.select: select RecId, M0702, M0703, M0704, M0706, M0707, M0708, M0709, M0710, Area, Dot,valid, VideoUrl,M0718 from M07 where RecId=#{recid}
mapper.update: UPDATE M07 SET area=#{Area},dot=#{Dot},M0718=#{M0718} WHERE Recid=#{RecId}
UPDATE M04 SET area=#{Area},dot=#{Dot},M0429=#{M0429} WHERE Recid=#{RecId}
mapper.select: SELECT ISNULL(t.Capacity,'') Capacity, ISNULL(t.CarNo,'')CarNo, ISNULL(t.CarType,'')CarType, ISNULL(t.CarframeNo,'')CarframeNo, ISNULL(t.CompanyName,'')CompanyName, ISNULL(t.DriverCardNo,'')DriverCardNo, ISNULL(t.DriverMobile,'')DriverMobile, ISNULL(t.DriverName,'')DriverName, ISNULL(t.EngineNo,'')EngineNo, ISNULL(t.ExpiryTime,'')ExpiryTime, ISNULL(t.GPSSFYC,'')GPSSFYC, ISNULL(t.OriginalCarNo,'')OriginalCarNo, ISNULL(t.RegisterTime,'')RegisterTime, ISNULL(t.SXSFQQ,'')SXSFQQ, ISNULL(t.ZYZG,'')ZYZG, ISNULL(m.M0108,'')M0108, ISNULL(m.M0109,'')M0109, ISNULL(t.DLicenseImage,'')DLicenseImage FROM View_TruckInfo t LEFT JOIN View_CompanyInfo c ON c.CompanyName=t.CompanyName LEFT JOIN M01 m ON c.CompanyId=m.MustId WHERE c.CompanyId=#{companyId} AND t.ZYZG=1

SELECT o.ACTION_RESULT AS actionResult, o.CALLER_DESC AS callerDesc, o.CREATE_TIME AS callerTime, o.CREATOR_DESC AS creatorDesc, o.DESCRIPTION AS description, o.DUE_DATE AS dueDate, o.FINISH_DATE AS finishDate, o.OWNER_DESC AS ownerDesc, o.SENDER_DESC AS senderDesc, o.SERIAL_NUMBER AS serialNumber, o.START_DATE AS startDate, o.STATUS AS status, o.STEP_NAME AS stepName FROM view_operprogress o WHERE o.serial_number = #{number}

SELECT n.NoticeId, n.Title, n.Content, n.Publisher, n.PublishTime, n.Owner, n.TitleColor, n.IsTop, n.IsPop, n.Mark, n.Category, n.Published, n.ExpireTime FROM Notice n where datediff(Month,n.PublishTime,getdate())=0

SELECT m.Creator, m.DispOrder, m.M0101, m.M0102, m.M0103, m.M0104, m.M0105, m.M0106, m.M0107, m.M0108, m.M0109, m.MustId, m.QRCode, m.ShortSpell, m.representative, m.registeredCapital, m.dateEstablishment, m.address, m.Status FROM M01 m where 1=1
and m.M0101 like '%'+#{name}+'%'

SELECT b.[time],a.[count] FROM ( SELECT BeginTime AS 'time', COUNT ( 1 ) AS 'count' FROM View_ProjectPermit GROUP BY BeginTime ) a RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT CONVERT ( CHAR ( 10 ), DATEADD( dd, number, #{time } ), 120 ) AS 'time' FROM master..spt_values WHERE type = 'p' AND DATEDIFF( MI, DATEADD( dd, number, #{time } ), ( SELECT CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 100 ), GETDATE( ), 23 ) ) ) > 0 ) b ON b.time = a.time;

SELECT TOP ${size} a.* FROM ( SELECT TOP ${total} ISNULL( p.BeginTime, '' ) BeginTime, ISNULL( p.EndTime, '' ) EndTime, ISNULL( p.LineName, '' ) LineName, ISNULL( p.PermitNo, '' ) PermitNo, ISNULL( p.CompanyName, '' ) CompanyName, ISNULL( p.ProjectName , '' ) ProjectName, ISNULL( p.Absorption, '' ) Absorption, ISNULL( p.place, '' ) place, ISNULL( p.mucktype, '' ) mucktype, ISNULL( p.approvetime, '' ) approvetime, ISNULL( p.permittype, '' ) permittype FROM View_PermitInfo p WHERE 1 = 1
AND p.CompanyName LIKE '%' + #{ name }+ '%'
AND p.ProjectName LIKE '%' + #{ pname }+ '%'
AND p.EndTime = #{BeginTime}
AND p.EndTime between #{time1} and #{time2}
AND CONVERT(nvarchar(10), p.EndTime,102 ) < CONVERT(nvarchar(10),GETDATE(),121)
ORDER BY p.EndTime DESC ) a ORDER BY a.EndTime ASC
SELECT pt.carNO from View_ProjectPermit p LEFT JOIN View_PermitTruck pt ON p.PermitNo = pt.PermitNo WHERE 1 = 1 AND p.PermitNo=#{PermitNo}
mapper.update: update M03 set DLicenseImage=#{img} where M0331=#{carNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT TOP ${size} a.* FROM ( SELECT TOP ${total} ISNULL( p.BeginTime, '' ) BeginTime, ISNULL( p.EndTime, '' ) EndTime, ISNULL( p.LineName, '' ) LineName, ISNULL( p.PermitNo, '' ) PermitNo, ISNULL( p.CompanyName, '' ) CompanyName, ISNULL( p.ProjectName , '' ) ProjectName, ISNULL( p.Absorption, '' ) Absorption, ISNULL( p.place, '' ) place, ISNULL( p.mucktype, '' ) mucktype, ISNULL( p.approvetime, '' ) approvetime, ISNULL( m03.m0331, '' ) carnumber, ISNULL( p.permittype, '' ) permittype FROM View_PermitInfo p LEFT JOIN M03 m03 ON m03.M0302=p.CompanyName WHERE 1 = 1
AND m03.m0331 LIKE '%' + #{ name }+ '%'
AND p.EndTime = #{BeginTime}
AND CONVERT(nvarchar(10), p.EndTime,102 ) < CONVERT(nvarchar(10),GETDATE(),121)
AND CONVERT(nvarchar(10), p.EndTime,102 ) >= CONVERT(nvarchar(10),GETDATE(),102)
ORDER BY p.EndTime DESC ) a ORDER BY a.EndTime ASC

SELECT count (1) FROM View_PermitInfo p LEFT JOIN M03 m03 ON m03.M0302=p.CompanyName WHERE 1 = 1
AND m03.m0331 LIKE '%' + #{ name }+ '%'
AND p.EndTime = #{BeginTime}
AND CONVERT(nvarchar(10), p.EndTime,102 ) < CONVERT(nvarchar(10),GETDATE(),102)
AND CONVERT(nvarchar(10), p.EndTime,102 ) >= CONVERT(nvarchar(10),GETDATE(),102)
select * from UserRole where UserId = #{userid} and RoleId = 1;
mapper.update: update M04 set valid=#{valid} where RecId=#{RecId}
update M07 set valid=#{valid} where RecId=#{RecId}
mapper.select: select count(OPERID) from Oper where Owner = #{userid} or OperId in ( select ObjId from UserAcl where UserId = #{userid} and ObjType = 'oper' and CanExec = 1 )
select count(ID) from OS_CURRENTSTEP where Owner LIKE '%,'+#{userid}+',%'
select count(ENTRY_ID) from OS_WFENTRY where creator = #{userid} AND STATE = 1
select count(ENTRY_ID) from OS_WFENTRY where creator = #{userid} AND STATE = 4
select MAX(userid) from users
select count(1) from users where UserName=#{UserName}

SELECT TOP ${size} a.* FROM ( SELECT TOP ${total} ISNULL( p.PermitNo, '' ) PermitNo, ISNULL( p.approvetime, '' ) approvetime, ISNULL( p.permittype, '' ) permittype, ISNULL( p.CompanyName, '' ) CompanyName, ISNULL( p.ProjectName , '' ) ProjectName, ISNULL( p.place, '' ) place, ISNULL( p.Absorption, '' ) Absorption, ISNULL( p.mucktype, '' ) mucktype, ISNULL( p.BeginTime, '' ) BeginTime, ISNULL( p.EndTime, '' ) EndTime, ISNULL( p.LineName, '' ) LineName FROM View_PermitInfo p WHERE 1 = 1
AND p.CompanyName LIKE '%' + #{ name }+ '%'
AND p.ProjectName LIKE '%' + #{ pname }+ '%'
AND p.EndTime = #{BeginTime}
AND p.EndTime between #{time1} and #{time2}
AND CONVERT(nvarchar(10), p.EndTime,102 ) < CONVERT(nvarchar(10),GETDATE(),121)
ORDER BY p.EndTime DESC ) a ORDER BY a.EndTime ASC
